title: march 7: the journey to the south pole
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the first expedition to reach the South Pole. After, she remembers the iconic single “We are the World,” written by Michael Jackson and Lionel Richie. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
